actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to delay the repayment of an advance or advances to the unemployment account of a State under title XII of the Social Security Act.

summary.text: Authorizes an additional five-year period to January 1, 1979, before States must begin repayment of outstanding advances to their unemployment compensation accounts.

titles.title: A bill to delay the repayment of an advance or advances to the unemployment account of a State under title XII of the Social Security Act.
